text: Ara tomara sakale allahara rajjuke sudrrha haste dharana kara; paraspara bicchinna hayo na. Ara tomara se neyamatera katha smarana kara, ya allaha tomadigake dana karechena. Tomara paraspara satru chile. Atahpara allaha tomadera mane sampriti dana karechena. Phale, ekhana tomara tamra anugrahera karane paraspara bha'i bha'i hayecha. Tomara eka agnikundera pare abasthana karachile. Atahpara ta theke tini tomaderake mukti diyechena. Ebhabe'i allaha nijera nidarsanasamuha prakasa karena, yate tomara hedayeta prapta hate para.
